content.text: [@dominic](@EMovhfIrFk4NihAKnRNhrfRaqIhBv1Wj8pTxJNgvCCY=.ed25519) the conditions for acceptable employment will vary based on legal jurisdiction, so I think it makes sense to have some nation-specific customization at that level, but otherwise the guild would operate internationally. The guild wouldn't have to be an incorporated entity right away, it could be a voluntary association of coops and freelancers that can make some collective demands about how they want to be treated in matters of employment.
